features.text1: Track what and how much you eat
features.text3: See your progress and improve your habits
features.text4: Don't forget to eat and drink water

hero.title1: Strong health starts with what you eat.
hero.text1: Want to eat more mindfully? Track your meals, learn about your habits, and achieve your goals with MyFitnessPal.
hero.title2: A log of over 14 million foods.
hero.text2: See a breakdown of calories and nutrients, compare portion sizes, and learn how the food you eat supports your goals.

cta.title: Start taking care of your health today :)
cta.text: Sending a message takes less than a minute — and you'll be able to track your nutrition and progress!

q1.question: How does your service work?
q1.answer: Our service offers an easy way to track nutrition and workouts. You can select a plan and monitor your progress.

q2.question: Can I change my meal plan?
q2.answer: Yes, you can change your plan anytime in your account settings.

q3.question: How do I contact support?
q3.answer: You can contact our support via the feedback form or email support@fitzone.com.

q4.question: What do I get after signing up?
q4.answer: You get access to a personalized nutrition tracker, tips, recommendations, and detailed analytics tailored to your goals.

q5.question: Can I fully customize my plan?
q5.answer: Absolutely! Choose your preferred foods, exclude allergens, and set your own goals. It's all flexible.

q6.question: What if I lose my data?
q6.answer: We keep backups. Contact support with your email and we’ll restore your data.

q7.question: Is FitZone beginner-friendly?
q7.answer: Yes! Everything is simple and intuitive. You'll get help from day one — with tips, tracking and motivation.

q8.question: Are your calorie and macros calculations accurate?
q8.answer: Yes. Our data is verified and matches nutritionist recommendations.

q9.question: I don’t know where to start — help?
q9.answer: Just sign up! The system will guide you step-by-step with a ready plan.
